ygData.subject: Re: Highpass Quest (spoiler material within)
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t, you need to attack the little thug with several PC s and just sacrifice one of them (you) to the Deputy s wrath. An alternative is to attack mister
ygData.messageBody:
You don't, you need to attack the little thug with several PC's and just
sacrifice one of them (you) to the Deputy's wrath. An alternative is to
attack mister deputy yourself, then run his little butt across the entire
zone. You zone, he starts trudging back, you zone back and speedrun past
him to the now alone thug. (Good roleplay there huh? ;)

I can't believe you got a Dwarven Axe for this. I was maybe too high level
when I did it (17th?) but I remember being really surprised as to how
especially crap the reward was. Literally something like 3 sp's.

Dud

-----Original Message-----
From: Blitz Krieg [SMTP:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Monday, July 05, 1999 2:11 PM

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dwarven Axe


How can you remove Deputy Looh from the area to kill Bronin in peace? : )
